thread.section_title: Wiggle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wiggle | wiggle.com.au
thread.title: Bern

author: Bern
title: Bern
text:
My daughter's parkrun milestone shirt arrived and she was so excited - until she went to pop it over her head... very tight! We are obviously a rather big headed - or thick pony tailed! - family and the stitches popped as she put it on! Due to the sturdy stitching it has not frayed or come undone, but perhaps a slightly bigger head hole might be needed for us neanderthal-typed-big-headed folk!!
:-)
